fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Hydro unit:__
Kokomi offers heals and more offensive 2nd Cryo
Mona offers buffing but no survivability and wants ~240 ER
Xingqiu/Yelan are good options but single target focused
Barbara can be used in a pinch

Rotations and more info in full guide linked below.

title: Kamisato Ayaka | Team Composition and Synergy
